item.title: hematopoietic
item.description:
Cell Sentence Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of hematopoietic tissue in 10 abstracts.

PMID Senteces
10223568 Thirty-one patients received cisplatin 60 mg/m2 on Day 1, 5-fluorouracil 600 mg on Days 1-4, folinic acid 100 mg/m2 on Days 1-4, mitomycin C 10 mg/m2 on Day 3, and etoposide 100 mg/m2 i.v. on Days 1-3, with prophylactic hematopoietic growth factors.
10564940 For hematopoietic malignancies, the cumulative risk was calculated to be about 7 per 10(4) person Sv (radiation weighting factor = 20).
1381341 CD7 has been regarded as one of the hematopoietic cell markers selectively expressed on the majority of T cells and multipotential stem cells. [â€¦] To our knowledge, this is the first report of a non-hematopoietic tumor expressing CD7.
14975938 Exosomes are membrane vesicles from endosomal origin secreted by various cells such as hematopoietic, epithelial, and tumor cells.
16118627 The prevalence of staining for specific malignancies varied with the tissue of origin as follows: ovarian (13/13, 100%); lung (9/11, 82%), breast (6/13, 46%); gastric (4/7, 57%), colon (0/4, 0%), pancreas (2/3, 67%), gallbladder (1/1, 100%), fallopian tube (1/3, 33%), endometrial (6/7, 86%), mesothelioma (4/5, 80%), carcinoma of unknown primary (5/5, 100%) and hematopoietic malignancies (3/9, 33%).
22027538 Eligible patients had biopsy-proven malignant pleural mesothelioma, were chemo-naive, Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status 0-2, had normal hematopoietic liver and renal function, and gave informed consent.
22692930 Excesses of mesothelioma and bladder cancer were found, whereas there was no excess of hematopoietic cancers despite high benzene and dioxin exposures.
6688764 Hematopoietic suppression was the major side-effect.
7105050 The treatment was subjectively well-tolerated and hematopoietic toxicity was acceptable.
9166476 Tumor cell lines established from the primary tumors or effusions of six of the malignant pleural mesothelioma patients showed high expression of the hematopoietic form of CD44.
